scripts.migrate: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx node-pg-migrate up -c pgm-config.js
scripts.migrate:up: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx node-pg-migrate up -c pgm-config.js
scripts.migrate:down: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx node-pg-migrate down -c pgm-config.js
scripts.migrate:create: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx node-pg-migrate create -c pgm-config.js
scripts.migrate:status: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx node-pg-migrate status -c pgm-config.js
scripts.migrate:redo: npx dotenv -e .env.local -- npx node-pg-migrate redo -c pgm-config.js
